name: Tyrant Ixlimor

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 25%

skills.name: Feast of Flame
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals this Champion by 25% of the damage inflicted. Heals this Champion by 50% of the damage inflicted instead if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff.

Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Hellfire Torrent
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 3 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Infernal Minions
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Fires of Doom
skills.raw_description: Decreases damage inflicted by enemies under [HP Burn] debuffs by 10%.

faction.raw_description: Beyond the dark portal lies a realm of fire and darkness. It is thehome of ancient beings born of darkness. Forbidden fromsetting foot in the fair lands of Teleria, these foul entities haveconspired with Necromancers to breed Demonspawn - unholyunions of Demon and mortal
